channel.title: No help file for script objects?
channel.description: When I get the help on a script object, I get a red box, and the "Object name script2 not found" message in the Axoloti window. Is there any tutorial using a script object? Thanks!

item.title: No help file for script objects?
item.dc:creator: @Gavin Gavin
item.description:
@Gavin wrote:

The only advantage I have found in using scripts is that some items can only be controlled in them. And the one I have used a lot, is Serial UART, whether this has or will change, I don't know, but it would be pretty neat to have a list of controls that can only be controlled in Scripts.

Read full topic
item.source: No help file for script objects?

item.title: No help file for script objects?
item.dc:creator: @jfcharles Jean-Francois Charles
item.description:
@jfcharles wrote:

Thanks. There is a good example in this thread: https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/how-does-the-script-objects-work-in-axoloti/827
Still, it would make sense to have a working "help" link.

Read full topic
item.source: No help file for script objects?

item.title: No help file for script objects?
item.dc:creator: @Gavin Gavin
item.description:
@Gavin wrote:

What I would recommend is search for some objects that use script.
The one I know off by heart is the Serial factory object under the GPIO category.

Read full topic
